name: Pipeline Execution
description: Execute multi-step workflows server-side with variable passing between steps, returning only final results

criteria.criterion: execute_pipeline tool is exposed and accepts steps array with tool_name, args, and optional id for each step
Steps execute sequentially server-side without intermediate results going to LLM context
Variable references ({{step_id.field}}) resolve correctly between steps, including array indexing ({{step_id[0].field}})
Pipeline supports 'delay_ms' option per step to wait before execution
Pipeline accepts 'return' template specifying which fields from which steps to include in final response
Failed step stops pipeline and returns error with step_id, error message, and partial results
Complex workflow (search → filter → send_sms → verify) executes in single tool call returning only summary
